Remove ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary supplies for the procedure.
Remove ostomy bag.subject: The nurse
Remove ostomy bag.tools: ostomy bag, adhesive remover, gauze, gloves, waste disposal bag

Remove ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse puts on gloves to maintain hygiene during the procedure.
Remove ostomy bag.subject: The nurse

Remove ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse carefully detaches the ostomy bag from the skin around the stoma.
Remove ostomy bag.subject: The nurse

Remove ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse cleans the skin around the stoma with gauze to prevent infection.
Remove ostomy bag.subject: The nurse

Remove ostomy bag.sentence: The nurse disposes of the used ostomy bag and materials in the waste disposal bag.
Remove ostomy bag.subject: The nurse
